summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 KIA SOUL. WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE, THERE WAS AN ABNORMAL KNOCKING NOISE COMING FROM THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT AND THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DENNIS DILLON KIA (9501 W FAIRVIEW AVE, SUITE B, BOISE, ID 83704, (208) 314-3403) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE KNOCK SENSOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AND THE ECM NEEDED TO BE UPDATED. THE CONTACT WAS ALSO INFORMED THAT METAL SHAVINGS WERE FOUND IN THE ENGINE. THE KNOCK SENSOR WAS REPLACED AND THE ECM WAS REPROGRAMMED. THE ENGINE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V120000 (ENGINE, ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING). THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 116,700. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
